statements.select: SELECT K.ID, K.SPID, K.SPBH, K.HW, K.CHBDJ*(1+ISNULL(( case when (select top 1 shlv from jh_rkmx(nolock) where jh_rkmx.spid=K.spid order by jh_rkmx.rq desc) is not null then (select top 1 shlv from jh_rkmx(nolock) where jh_rkmx.spid=K.spid order by jh_rkmx.rq desc) when (select top 1 shlv from spkfk(nolock) where spkfk.spid=K.spid) is not null then (select top 1 shlv from spkfk(nolock) where spkfk.spid=K.spid) when (select top 1 shlv from sku_spkfk_shlv(nolock) where sku_spkfk_shlv.spid=K.spid) is not null then (select top 1 shlv from sku_spkfk_shlv(nolock) where sku_spkfk_shlv.spid=K.spid) else (SELECT TOP 1 SHLV FROM gsspdyb B WHERE B.SPID=K.SPID) end ),0)/100) AS CHBDJ FROM( SELECT A.ID, ROW_NUMBER()OVER(ORDER BY A.LASTMODIFYTIME) AS 'Row', A.SPID, A.SPBH, A.HW, A.CHBDJ FROM price_Data A WHERE A.IS_PUSHED=0 AND A.HW=#stock# )K WHERE K.ROW<=#Dcount#
